snippet: A British judge ruled that the woman, Janan Harb, 68, should receive more than $23 million and two apartments in London that had been promised to her by King Fahd.
abstract: British judge Peter Smith rules in favor of Janan Harb, woman who says she was secret wife of deceased Saudi ruler King Fahd; decision gives Harb, who successfully argued she was promised a settlement by Fahd’s son, over $23 million and two London apartments.
lead_paragraph: A British judge ruled that the woman, Janan Harb, 68, should receive more than $23 million and two apartments in London that had been promised to her by King Fahd.

headline.print_headline: Europe; Britain: Payout for Saudi’s ‘Secret Wife’
